contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Kijewo Królewskie | settlement_type = Village | total_type =   | image_flag = | image_shield = POL gmina Kijewo Królewskie COA.png | image_skyline = Kijewo Krolewskie Church2.jpg | image_caption = [[Saint Lawrence]] Church | coordinates_region = PL | subdivision_type = [[Countries of the world|Country]] | subdivision_name = {{POL}} | subdivision_type1 = [[Voivodeships of Poland|Voivodeship]] | subdivision_name1 = [[Kuyavian-Pomeranian Voivodeship|Kuyavian-Pomeranian]] | subdivision_type2 = [[Powiat|County]] | subdivision_name2 = [[Chełmno County|Chełmno]] | subdivision_type3 = [[Gmina]] | subdivision_name3 = [[Gmina Kijewo Królewskie|Kijewo Królewskie]] | latd = 53 | latm = 16 | lats = 26 | latNS = N | longd = 18 | longm = 26 | longs = 41 | longEW = E | pushpin_map = Poland | elevation_m = | population_total = | website = http://www.kijewo.pl }} '''Kijewo Królewskie''' {{IPAc-pl|k|i|'|j|e|w|o|-|k|r|u|'|l|e|f|s|k|J|e}} ({{lang-de|Königlich Kiewo}}) is a village in [[Chełmno County]], [[Kuyavian-Pomeranian Voivodeship]], in north-central Poland.<ref name="TERYT">{{cite web|url=http://www.stat.gov.pl/broker/access/prefile/listPreFiles.jspa|title=Central Statistical Office (GUS) - TERYT (National Register of Territorial Land Apportionment Journal)|date=2008-06-01|language=Polish}}</ref> It is the seat of the [[gmina]] (administrative district) called [[Gmina Kijewo Królewskie]]. It lies {{convert|11|km|mi|0}} south of [[Chełmno]], {{convert|30|km|mi|0|abbr=on}} north-west of Toruń, and {{convert|35|km|mi|0|abbr=on}} north-east of Bydgoszcz. The name of the village means "Royal Kijewo". ==References== {{reflist}} {{commons category|Kijewo Królewskie}} {{Gmina Kijewo Królewskie}} {{coord|53|16|26|N|18|26|41|E|region:PL_type:city|display=title}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Kijewo Krolewskie}} [[Category:Villages in Chełmno County]] {{Chełmno-geo-stub}}
